ok so in your DayZ client folder you need:
DayZ\<Mod Name>\Addons\<all addons + bisigns>
DayZ\<Mod Name>\Keys\<bikeyname>.bikey (public .bikey file that was created by your .privatebikey)
DayZ\<Mod Name\mod.cpp

DayZServer\keys\dayz.bikey
DayZServer\keys\<bikeyname>.bikey (public bikey created by your .privatebikey)
DayZServer\<Mod Name>\Addons\<all addons + bisigns>
DayZServer\<Mod Name>\Keys\<bikeyname>.bikey (public bikey created by your .privatebikey)
DayZServer\<ModName>\mod.cpp
